snippet: Lille signed Ivory Coast international Salomon Kalou on Saturday in a bid to bolster their depleted forward line having sold Eden Hazard to the European champions.
lead_paragraph: Lille signed Ivory Coast international Salomon Kalou on Saturday in a bid to bolster their depleted forward line having sold Eden Hazard to the European champions.

headline.seo: Chelsea Forward Salomon Kalou Signs With Lille
headline.main: Chelsea Forward Kalou Signs With French Club
